nodes.text: The Industrial Site Guard Droid MC-1K was a model of humanoid battle droid used by the reconstituted Sith Empire as guard units on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. A number of MC-1K units were deployed in the Empire's warehousing facilities in the Lower Industrial Sector.
A number of Industrial Site Guard Droid MC-1K appears as enemies on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011.
